protectionindicator-extension-explanatio:
Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a cascading protection icon. $1 represents the action, $2 represents the level of protection.
Message supports wikitext.

Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal ( non cascading and non flaggedrevs) protection icon. $1 represents the action, $2 represents the level of protection and $3 represents the time at which the protection expires.
Message supports wikitext.

Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal ( non cascading and non flaggedrevs) protection icon on a page that has been protected with no expiry date. $1 represents the action, $2 represents the level of protection.
Message supports wikitext.

Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal flaggedrevs protection icon. $1 represents the level of protection and $1 represents the time at which the protection expires.
Message supports wikitext.

Informational text show in a popup to users on clicking on a normal flaggedrevs protection iconn a page that has been protected with no expiry date. $1 represents the level of protection and $2 represents the time at which the protection expires.
Message supports wikitext.
